Title: Dragon Ball: The Path to Power
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Aya Matsui (screenplay)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Naoki Tatsuta, Naoko Watanabe
Plot: A great retelling of the original Dragonball series, It starts off With Son Goku, meeting Bulma, and then they go off on a Journey to Find the Seven Dragonballs, while running into a lot of...
